152701.「学園のチャレンジバトルです。\n 班のなかまと 一緒にバトルをして\n 武器を:
School Challenge Battles... Let's battle it
out together with our squad and get some
weapons!<bw_break>

152702.「合コンってのは 『合同懇親教練』の略ネ。\n 学園の 歴史ある課外活動らしいん:
A blind date is a joint get-together. It's an extracurricular activity with a long history at the school, but it's a bit of a hassle, so
we just call it a party. In a blind date, a group of students from the same class form a party and fight off the toughest demons...
It's a great way to build up your body and mind.They may be demons, but they're really good teachers, so there's no need to be afraid. You won't get wiped out... If you don't have
four friends, I'll match you up with someone who does, so feel free to join in solo!

152703.「合コンに参加するには チケットが必要だよ。\n 購買部で 教練チケットってのが:
You need a ticket to get into the party. You can buy them in the purchasing department. The proceeds from the ticket sales will be
used to pay for the activities of our blind date team, so please cooperate with us there.And this is important! If one of us has a ticket, the others in the party can join without a ticket! That's it! The person who
has the ticket becomes the party leader, and invites his or her friends to join the party. The ticket will be collected if you
successfully win... Even if you lose, you won't lose your tickets, so keep trying!

152704.「合コン相手は いくつかランクがあるの。\n ざっくり言うと 相手をやっつける難:
There are a few different ranks of blind dates. To put it bluntly, they're difficult to defeat. The type of pure jewels you can
take home changes depending on the rank you choose... I think I'd recommend bronze for starters.Ah! As the seasons change, special blind dates are set up for the Night Fest, which you can attend without a ticket.It's a badass night where you can drop special opponents and get the coolest jewels!

152705.「合コンに勝利すると ピュアジュエルってのが\n もらえるよー。学園で使える装備:
When you win a party, you get pure jewels... It's the motto for making equipment that can be used at the school and for evolving...
That's not good! You can join the party solo, but if you join a party with other girls from your class, can you take home a little extra
Pure Jewels? And yes, you have to be in the same classroom to party with your classmates, so please keep that in mind. The Pure Jewels
are managed by us, so feel free to talk to us... We're going to have a lot of blind dates and get some cool weapons.

152706.「合コンってのは 『合同懇親教練』の略さ。\n 学園の 歴史ある課外活動らしーん:
A blind date is a "joint get-together"... It's an extracurricular activity with a long history at the school, but it's a bit of a
hassle, so we just call it a party. We call it a "party party" because we're all in the same class, and we're supposed to party
together and defeat tough demons. But it's also about building up your mind and body. But they're all teachers, so you don't have
to be afraid... You won't be wiped out... If you don't have four friends, I'll match you up with someone who does, so feel free to
join us solo!

152707.「合コンに参加するには チケットが必要だぜ。\n 購買部で 教練チケットってのが:
You'll need a ticket to get into the party. Tickets for training are on sale in the purchasing department, so please go buy some.
The proceeds from the ticket sales will be used to pay for our activities, so please cooperate with us.And here's the thing! If one of us has a ticket, the rest of the party can join without a ticket... That's it! The person who
has the ticket becomes the party leader, and they invite their friends to join the party. The ticket will be collected if you
successfully win. Even if you lose, the tickets won't disappear, so keep trying!

152708.「合コン相手は いくつかランクがあるんだ。\n ざっくり言うと 相手をやっつける:
There are several ranks of matchmaking partners. To put it bluntly, they're difficult to defeat. Depending on the rank
you choose, the type of pure jewels you can take home will change... I'd recommend Bronze at first... And when the season changes,
there's a special Night Fest that you can attend without a ticket. It's a night where you can win special partners and get the
hottest jewels!

152709.「合コンに勝利すると ピュアジュエルってのが\n もらえる。学園で使える装備を作:
When you win a party, you get pure jewels. It's the motto for making equipment that can be used in the school and for evolving...
That's not good! You can join the party solo, but if you join a party with girls from your group in this class, can you take home a
little extra Pure Jewels? Yes, you have to be in the same classroom to party with your group, so keep that in mind... The Pure
Jewels are managed by us, so feel free to talk to us... Let's go on a blind date and get some hot weapons!

154774.「ジュエル装備を 作るときは\n こんな錬金効果セットの中から\n 選んだものを:
When you make Jewel equipment, you'll have to choose one of these alchemy effect sets to attach it to. Once you've decided on an
alchemy effect set, you can't change it, so think carefully before you choose! When you evolve the weapon you've made, you'll get a
higher version of this alchemy effect! Go ahead and make the best weapon you can!

154775.「フェスってのは 季節が変わると開催される\n 特別なイベントで ここでしか作れ:
A festival is a special event held when the seasons change, and you can get rare accessories that can only be made here... If
you're looking for festival accessories, you can get them at Night Fest! And don't worry, Night Fest won't be canceled just because the
season changes!

154776.「ジュエル装備を 作るときは\n こんな錬金効果セットの中から\n 選んだものを:
When you make Jewel equipment, you'll have to choose one of these alchemy effect sets to attach it to. Once you've decided on an
alchemy effect set, you can't change it, so think carefully before you choose! When you evolve the weapon you've made, you'll get a
higher version of this alchemy effect! Go ahead and make the best weapon you can!

154777.「ナイトフェスで手に入るジュエルと交換で\n イケてるアクセを プレゼントするぜ:
I'll give you some cool accessories in
exchange for the jewels you get at Night
Fest. Which one do you want?<break>

154779.「合コンで集めた ピュアジュエルを使って\n ジュエル装備ってのを 作ることがで:
You can use the pure jewels you collected at the party to make jewel equipment... When making Jewel equipment, you can choose from a
set of alchemy effects like the ones shown here.However, once you've decided on a set of alchemy effects, you can't change it, so think carefully before choosing... This is
very important... The Jewel Weapons you've made can be evolved to have higher level alchemy effects... You've got to make the
best weapon you can!

154780.「フェスってのは 季節が変わると開催される\n 特別なイベントで ここでしか作れ:
A festival is a special event that's held when the seasons change, and you can get some really rare accessories that can only be made
here... If you're looking for festival accessories, you can get them at Night Fest! And don't worry, Night Fest won't be canceled
just because the season changes!

154781.「ジュエル装備を作るときは\n ここにあるような 錬金効果セットの中から\n キ:
